text: Ware ga shirushi o kudasu koto o hikaeru no wa, mukashi no min ga sore o itsuwaridearu to shitakara nihokanaranai. Ware wa izen samudo ni, akirakana shirushi no mesu rakuda o sazuketaga, kare-ra wa sore o hakugai shita. Ware ga shirushi o kudasu no wa, tada osore no nen o daka seru tame nihokanaranai
